content.text:
# 46th Félix Awards

The 46th Félix Awards was held on November 3, 2024, to honour achievements in Quebec music. The ceremony was hosted by comedian Pierre-Yves Roy-Desmarais.
The advance gala, presenting the awards in lower-profile and industry categories, was held on October 30.
Nominees and winners
